name: Curry Fish Stew
author: Kristin
summary: This is a recipe I invented as a treat during college. It is a tasty, quick, and inexpensive dinner. Serve with jasmine rice, steamed broccoli or salad, and baguette.
ingredients: 1  fresh red chile pepper, finely chopped
¾ pound cod fillets, cut into 1 inch cubes
directions: Heat oil in a medium saucepan over medium heat
Stir in onion, green onions, red chile pepper, and pimentos
Cook and stir until onions are tender, about 5 minutes
Mix in curry powder, and continue to cook and stir 2 to 5 minutes
Blend cream into the onion mixture, and simmer until thickened
Mix in cod, cooking 3 to 5 minutes, until easily flaked with a fork
Season with garlic powder, salt, and pepper
